creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: reverse copy of L2014.265.146 (2015.93.141): young man kneeling at a river bank, pinning a large fish to the ground with his hand; the man is looking behind him to an angel in the L side of image, who is pointing in an instructive manner and holding a purse; dog at far L, city in background at R; copy of Georg Pencz print
marks: Signature, Title, and Marks URC, in print: PG (backwards) | bottom, in print:
title: The Angel and Tobias
